message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CL, cs.ED, cs.LG, cs.MM. 

The paper focuses on the development of a system for authoring, recording, and reviewing interactive multimedia exercises embedded in lecture videos. This system has potential applications in various fields, including human-computer interaction (cs.HC), computational linguistics (cs.CL), education (cs.ED), machine learning (cs.LG), and multimedia (cs.MM). However, given the emphasis on pedagogy and educational technology, cs.ED is the most likely sub-category, followed by cs.HC and cs.CL, which are relevant to the design and evaluation of interactive systems. cs.LG and cs.MM are less likely but still possible, as they relate to the use of machine learning and multimedia technologies in educational contexts.
